screenings.Series: For Academy Members and their families
screenings.Synopsis: Christopher Robin is now grown up and living in London but he has lost his way. His childhood friends venture from the Hundred Acre Wood to help Robin appreciate the simple pleasures in life once again.
screenings.Credits: Starring Ewan McGregor, Hayley Atwell, Jim Cummings and Brad Garrett. Produced by Brigham Taylor and Kristin Burr. Screenplay by Alex Ross Perry and Allison Schroeder. Based on characters created by A. A. Milne and E. H. Shepard. Directed by Marc Forster.
screenings.Venue_Name: Premier Theatre at Lucasfilm's Letterman Digital Arts Center & Skywalker Sound Stag Theatre

misc.Description: Bay Area screenings are held simultaneously in two different locations: the Premier Theatre at Lucasfilm's Letterman Digital Arts Center, 1 Letterman Drive, San Francisco, and the Skywalker Sound Stag Theatre, 5858 Lucas Valley Road, Nicasio. To RSVP for a screening in either location, dial 415-746-3100 and please provide the name of your guest.Call 310-247-3614 for 24-hour Screening Schedule Information.Academy Members may bring one guest to screenings.
